name: able drinker
description: However much you drink, liquor never affects any of your rolls.

name: combat reflexes
description: After initiative is rolled for any Combat Round, you may re-roll one of your action dice, but you are forced to keep the new roll.

name: appearance - above average
description: +1 unkept die for all social rolls

name: appearance - stunning
description: +2 unkept dice for all social rolls

name: dangerous beauty
description: You always roll 2 extra unkept dice for any seduction attempts.
